timeline.bodyText: Any reason why this has to use pinot.client.ResultSet (which seems like a really old class). We have ResultTable used for returning responses that is a more recent code, you may want to check it out.
timeline.author: mayankshriv

replies.bodyText: +1, lets use resultTable. Its ok to say we support jdbc only on SQL endpoint
replies.author: kishoreg

replies.bodyText:
Since I am using Java client to run queries, it is currently returning ResultSet.
Should I create a seperate PR making changes in the Java client first so that it returns ResultTable?
replies.author: KKcorps
kishoreg

timeline.bodyText: _queryFormat can be a static final, instead of initializing in constructor?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

timeline.bodyText: Does it make sense to make it case insensitive check?
timeline.author: mayankshriv

timeline.message: implementing various data types for ResultSet
moving unsupported and overloaded functions to abstract class
adding unit tests for result set
bug fix and unit tests for result set
adding prepared statement and fix license headers
adding unit tests for prepared statements
moving default methods to abstract class
adding support for fetching column data type
